abstract: Pete Rose submits new request to be reinstated to baseball; Rose agreed to lifetime ban in 1989; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rose has submitted a new request to be reinstated to baseball, said the new commissioner, Rob Manfred.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Baseball; Rose Seeks Reinstatement

snippet: Rose has submitted a new request to be reinstated to baseball, said the new commissioner, Rob Manfred.
